languages.text:
Installs focus lenses which allow {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}-mounted {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g} to be used in sensory overload mode.
In this mode, the lance weapon suffers a −15% penalty to hit chance but inflicts the sensory overload effect on its target. This effect significantly reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} for the next round.

traits.locale_text:
Installs focusing lenses wich allows prow mounted lances to fire in Sensors Overload mode.
This mode suffers -15 % hit chances but applies Sensor Overload effect on target wich greatly reduces its maneuverability for next round.

Installs focus lenses which allow to use prow-mounted lance weapon in the sensory overload mode.
In this mode, the lance weapon suffers a −15% penalty to hit chance but inflicts the sensory overload effect on its target. This effect significantly reduces the target's manoeuvrability for the next round.

Installs focus lenses which allow to use prow-mounted lance weapon in the sensory overload mode.
In this mode, the lance weapon suffers a −15% penalty to hit chance but inflicts the sensory overload effect on its target. This effect significantly reduces the target's manoeuvrability for the next round.

In this mode, the lance weapon suffers a −15% penalty to hit chance but inflicts the sensory overload effect on its target. This effect significantly reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} for the next round.

In this mode, the lance weapon suffers a −15% penalty to hit chance but inflicts the sensory overload effect on its target. This effect significantly reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} for the next round.

Installs focus lenses which allow {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}-mounted {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g} to be used in sensory overload mode.
In this mode, the lance weapon suffers a −15% penalty to hit chance but inflicts the sensory overload effect on its target. This effect significantly reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} for the next round.

languages.text:
Устанавливает фокусировочные линзы, позволяющие использовать {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}носовые{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}лэнс-излучатели{/g} в режиме сенсорной перегрузки.
В этом режиме лэнс-излучатели получают штраф −15% к попаданию, но накладывают на цель сенсорную перегрузку. Этот эффект существенно сокращает {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}маневренность{/g} цели в следующем раунде.
languages.original_text:
Installs focus lenses which allow {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}-mounted {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g} to be used in sensory overload mode.
In this mode, the lance weapon suffers a −15% penalty to hit chance but inflicts the sensory overload effect on its target. This effect significantly reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} for the next round.

traits.locale_text:
Устанавливает фокусировочные линзы, позволяющие использовать носовые лэнс-излучатели в режиме сенсорной перегрузки.
В этом режиме лэнс-излучатели получают штраф −15% к попаданию, но накладывают на цель сенсорную перегрузку. Этот эффект существенно сокращает маневренность цели в следующем раунде.

Устанавливает фокусировочные линзы, позволяющие использовать носовые лэнс-излучатели в режиме сенсорной перегрузки.
В этом режиме лэнс-излучатели получают штраф −15% к попаданию, но накладывают на цель сенсорную перегрузку. Этот эффект существенно сокращает маневренность цели в следующем раунде.

languages.text:
Installiert Fokuslinsen, durch die am {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}Bug{/g} montierte {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}Lanzenwaffen{/g} im sensorischen Überlastungsmodus genutzt werden können.
In diesem Modus hat die Lanzenwaffe einen Abzug von −15 % auf ihre Trefferchance, aber sie belegt das Ziel mit dem Effekt "Sensorische Überlastung". Dieser Effekt reduziert die {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Manövrierbarkeit{/g} des Ziels in der nächsten Runde deutlich.
languages.original_text:
Installs focus lenses which allow {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}-mounted {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g} to be used in sensory overload mode.
In this mode, the lance weapon suffers a −15% penalty to hit chance but inflicts the sensory overload effect on its target. This effect significantly reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} for the next round.

traits.locale_text:
Installiert Fokuslinsen, durch die am {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}Bug{/g} montierte {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}Lanzenwaffen{/g} im sensorischen Überlastungsmodus genutzt werden können.
In diesem Modus hat die Lanzenwaffe einen Abzug von -15 % auf ihre Trefferchance, aber sie belegt das Ziel mit dem Effekt "Sensorische Überlastung". Dieser Effekt reduziert die {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Manövrierbarkeit{/g} des Ziels in der nächsten Runde deutlich.

languages.text:
Installe des lentilles focales qui permettent d'utiliser les {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}armes de type lance{/g} montées sur la {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proue{/g} en mode Surcharge sensorielle.
En mode Surcharge sensorielle, les lances subissent une pénalité de −15 % à leurs chances de toucher, mais infligent l'effet Surcharge sensorielle à leur cible, ce qui réduit leur {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manœuvrabilité{/g} de manière importante lors du prochain round.
languages.original_text:
Installs focus lenses which allow {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}-mounted {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g} to be used in sensory overload mode.
In this mode, the lance weapon suffers a −15% penalty to hit chance but inflicts the sensory overload effect on its target. This effect significantly reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} for the next round.

traits.locale_text:
Installe des lentilles focales qui permettent d'utiliser les {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}armes de type lance{/g} montées sur la {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proue{/g} en mode Surcharge sensorielle.
En mode Surcharge sensorielle, les lances subissent une pénalité de -15 % à leurs chances d'infliger un coup, mais infligent l'effet Surcharge sensorielle à leur cible, ce qui réduit leur {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manœuvrabilité{/g} de manière importante lors du prochain round.

Installe des lentilles focales qui permettent d'utiliser les {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}armes de type lance{/g} montées sur la {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proue{/g} en mode Surcharge sensorielle.
En mode Surcharge sensorielle, les lances subissent une pénalité de -15 % à leurs chances d'infliger un coup, mais infligent l'effet Surcharge sensorielle à leur cible, ce qui réduit leur {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manœuvrabilité{/g} de manière importante lors du prochain round.

languages.text:
Instala lentes de enfoque que permiten utilizar las {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}armas de lanza{/g} equipadas a {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proa{/g} en modalidad de sobrecarga sensorial.
En esta modalidad, el arma de lanza sufre una penalización de −15 % a la probabilidad de impacto, pero causa un efecto de sobrecarga sensorial en el blanco. Este efecto reduce de manera significativa la {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}maniobrabilidad{/g} del blanco durante el siguiente asalto.
languages.original_text:
Installs focus lenses which allow {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}-mounted {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g} to be used in sensory overload mode.
In this mode, the lance weapon suffers a −15% penalty to hit chance but inflicts the sensory overload effect on its target. This effect significantly reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} for the next round.

traits.locale_text:
Instala lentes de enfoque que permiten utilizar las {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}armas de lanza{/g} equipadas a {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}proa{/g} en modalidad de sobrecarga sensorial.
En esta modalidad, el arma de lanza sufre una penalización de −15 % a la probabilidad de impacto, pero causa un efecto de sobrecarga sensorial en el blanco. Este efecto reduce de manera significativa la {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}maniobrabilidad{/g} del blanco durante el siguiente asalto.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}船首{/g}搭載の{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}ランスウェポン{/g}を感覚過負荷モードで使用できるようにする焦点レンズを取り付ける。
このモードでは、ランス武器は命中確率に-15%のペナルティを受けるが、対象に感覚過負荷効果を与える。この効果は、次のラウンドの間、対象の{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}操縦性{/g}を著しく低下させる。
languages.original_text:
Installs focus lenses which allow {g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}prow{/g}-mounted {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}lance weapons{/g} to be used in sensory overload mode.
In this mode, the lance weapon suffers a −15% penalty to hit chance but inflicts the sensory overload effect on its target. This effect significantly reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} for the next round.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}船首{/g}搭載の{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}ランスウェポン{/g}を感覚過負荷モードで使用できるようにする焦点レンズを取り付ける。
このモードでは、ランス武器は命中確率に-15%のペナルティを受けるが、対象に感覚過負荷効果を与える。この効果は、次のラウンドの間、対象の{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}操縦性{/g}を著しく低下させる。

languages.text:
安装焦距镜头，允许{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}舰首{/g}安装的{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}光矛武器{/g}发动感官过载模式。
在感官过载模式下，光矛武器的命中率会降低15%，但会对目标造成“感官过载”效果，显著降低目标下一轮的{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}机动性{/g}。
languages.original_text:

In this mode, the lance weapon suffers a −15% penalty to hit chance but inflicts the sensory overload effect on its target. This effect significantly reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} for the next round.

traits.locale_text:
安装焦距镜头，允许{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}舰首{/g}安装的{g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}光矛武器{/g}发动感官过载模式。
在感官过载模式下，光矛武器的命中率会降低15%，但会对目标造成“感官过载”效果，显著降低目标下一轮的{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}机动性{/g}。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:ProwSpace}Pruvaya{/g} monte edilen {g|Encyclopedia:LanceWeaponSpace}mızrak silahlarının{/g} sensörel fazla yükleme modunda kullanılabilmesini sağlayan odak merceği yerleştirir.
Mızrak silahı, bu moddayken vuruş olasılığına −%15 ceza puanı alır ancak hedefi üzerinde sensörel fazla yükleme etkisi oluşturur. Bu etki, bir sonraki rauntta hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manevra kabiliyetini{/g} önemli ölçüde azaltır.
languages.original_text:

In this mode, the lance weapon suffers a −15% penalty to hit chance but inflicts the sensory overload effect on its target. This effect significantly reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g} for the next round.
